LanguageData.BM_SpacerAutopistolCombatModule.label: autopistol module
LanguageData.BM_SpacerAutopistolCombatModule.descript: A high-tech combat-oriented device that can be installed into any compatible artificial arm or leg replacement. This particular model includes a modified autopistol that can be fully retracted outside of combat, allowing the wielder to carry it around comfortably with no interference during daily tasks.
